trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> objects in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid" /> 控件中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objects, which in turn represent the data items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>类表示的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>对象，它们反过来表示中的数据项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件。

trans-unit.source: To programmatically retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objects from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, use one of following methods:
trans-unit.target: 若要以编程方式检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>对象从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制，请使用以下方法之一：

trans-unit.source: Use the indexer to get a single <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the collection, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用索引器获取单个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>中使用数组表示法的集合对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection to a <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which can then be used to get items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法复制到集合的内容<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>，其中然后可以用于从集合中获取项。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface, which can then be used to get items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法来创建<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口，用于从集合中获取项。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A> property specifies the total number of items in the collection and is commonly used to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A>属性集合中指定的项总数和通常用于确定集合中的上限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to iterate through <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objects in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何循环访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> that contains the items with which to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于初始化集合的项的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>类。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个从零开始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它接收 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> 的复制项。

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中接收复制内容的第一个位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> collection to the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index in the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 将此 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> 集合中的所有项复制到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />（从 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的指定索引位置开始）。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法的内容复制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>到指定的集合<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: `array`参数必须是一个从零开始<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> 对象的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> 对象的数目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A> property to determine the number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A>属性来确定的数目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A> property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A>当循环访问集合以确定上限，绑定的集合时，通常使用属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />-implemented object that contains all the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的对象，该对象包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> 集合中的所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />-implemented object that contains all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的对象，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> 中的所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>-implemented object that can be iterated through to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法创建<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>-实现可以循环访问获取每个项的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>当前获取的项的属性指向集合中。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将移动到集合中的下一项。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move the enumerator to its initial position.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将枚举器移到其初始位置。

trans-unit.source: After you create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>-implemented object or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 在创建后<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=nameWithType>-实现对象或使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将枚举器移到的第一项在集合中，必须调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 否则，表示的项<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是不确定。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> objects in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> collection can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可修改 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> 集合中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection can be written to in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回`false`，则指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>集合可以在所有情况下写入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> collection is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示对 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> 集合的访问是否为同步的（线程安全的）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性派生自<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口，并在重写以始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>属性，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中检索的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> 的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中指定索引位置的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" /> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 位于集合中指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection at the specified index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用此索引器获取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>使用数组表示法的指定索引处的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection" /> 集合访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可用于同步集合访问的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> object itself.
trans-unit.target: 在此实现中返回的对象是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>对象本身。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>属性，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。
